replies.author: 深拥v
replies.txt_content:
@echo off

set restart=0

:restart

set server_name=[BC]大厅

title %server_name%服 重启次数%restart%次

java -Xms1G -Xmx3G  -jar paperclip.jar
timeout /t 5 /NOBREAK

set/a restart=restart+1

goto restart
